alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 2:19PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Iron County through 245 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southeast of Ursine, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newcastle and Modena. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 18 between mile markers 47 and 51. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 8 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
